alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Central Plaquemines; Coastal Jefferson; Eastern Orleans; Lower Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Lower Terrebonne; St. Charles; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Jefferson; Upper Lafourche; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Upper Terrebonne; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 19 at 4:06PM CST until January 21 at 9:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST SATURDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT SATURDAY NIGHT TO 9 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. For the second Freeze Warning, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Louisiana that are generally south of Interstate 10. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 9 AM CST Saturday. For the second Freeze Warning, from midnight Saturday night to 9 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
